sections.divorceDesc: Turnkey divorce and dissolution of marriage — without your personal participation, presence, or even the consent of the second spouse. We will help you protect your interests at all stages of the process.
sections.pretensionDescription: If you are facing unfulfilled obligations — unpaid debt, contract breach, or substandard service — we will help restore justice. We handle everything from pre-trial settlement to full court representation.
sections.businessDescription: Your personal lawyer on retainer — always available and ready to promptly resolve any legal matter for your company. You don't need to maintain in-house counsel; we provide the full spectrum of services and cost optimization.

service1.title: Divorce without your participation
service1.desc: We will help you conduct all legal procedures — from preparing documents to representing your interests in court. You don't need to waste time and nerves — entrust the process to professionals.

service2.title: Divorce without spouse consent
service2.desc: If the second spouse does not agree or does not appear in court, we will provide competent support and protection of your interests, even if the spouse actively opposes the divorce.

service3.title: Divorce with or without children
service3.desc: We successfully handle cases with or without children. We will take on all legal issues: division of property, determination of the child's place of residence, collection of alimony. Your interests are in safe hands.

service4.title: Divorce when spouse's location is unknown
service4.desc: Even if your spouse's whereabouts are unknown, we will initiate legal proceedings, carry out all necessary procedures and achieve official dissolution of marriage without delays.

service5.title: Alimony collection
service5.desc: We will prepare a complete package of documents, analyze your income and court and ensure a fair decision. You will receive reliable protection — quickly, legally, and without unnecessary complications.

service6.title: Determining child visitation schedule
service6.desc: For parents who want to establish a clear order of meetings with the child. We will help develop a convenient and fair schedule that meets the interests of the child and achieve official dissolution of rights without delays.

service1.title: Pre-trial Settlement
service1.description: We draft and send a pre-trial claim to the opposing party with a clear description of violations, demands, and deadline for compliance. This often allows resolving the dispute amicably, without court proceedings and unnecessary expenses.

service2.title: Evidence Base Formation
service2.description: We thoroughly analyze the situation, collect and systematize documents, expert opinions, testimonies, and other evidence.

service3.title: Court Representation
service3.description: If the dispute cannot be settled amicably, we prepare the statement of claim, file it with the court, and fully represent your interests at hearings.

service4.title: Working with Any Opponents
service4.description: We handle cases not only with companies and private individuals, but also with government agencies.

service1.title: Contract Analysis
service1.description: We analyze every clause of the contract: review terms, legal consequences, and potential legal risks. Such analysis allows you to minimize risks and avoid future conflicts.

service2.title: Contract Development and Support
service2.description: We create new contracts for specific tasks of your business: supply, lease, contracting, service provision, etc. If the partner's terms don't align with your interests, we will draft a protocol of disagreements and ensure amendments are made.

service3.title: Counterparty Verification
service3.description: Before entering into a transaction, it's important to know who you're dealing with. We verify counterparties for debts, litigation, registry entries, and other factors that may affect cooperation.

service4.title: Preparation of Official Letters and Responses
service4.description: We prepare legally competent letters, inquiries, and responses for negotiations with partners, clients, government, or state agencies. Such business correspondence helps effectively protect your interests.

service5.title: Working with Government Agencies
service5.description: If your business faces an inspection or dispute, we take control of the process. We participate in negotiations with various agencies, prepare objections and complaints, and appeal unlawful actions or decisions.

service6.title: Trademark Registration and Intellectual Property Protection
service6.description: We help register trademarks, patents, and other intellectual property objects, so that no one can unlawfully use your development or brand.

service7.title: Comprehensive Legal Business Support
service7.description: We are always by your side — from documentation on current issues to supporting large-scale projects. Regardless of the situation, you receive a complete solution, risk reduction, and optimization for business development.

adv1.title: Years of practice
adv1.desc: Legal practice experience of more than 10 years.

adv2.title: Confidentiality
adv2.desc: We guarantee complete confidentiality of your information. All data received during the work is protected and not transferred to third parties without your consent.

adv3.title: Personal approach
adv3.desc: Individual work with each client allows solving even the most complex problems.

adv4.title: Excellent service
adv4.desc: We provide quality service and value our clients.

adv5.title: Efficiency
adv5.desc: For each case, we allocate a specialist who works only with your company.

adv6.title: Benefit
adv6.desc: We have fixed prices for standard services, so you always know what you are paying for.

contact.subtitle: Choose convenient way
contact.desc: Contact me in any way and I will help solve your legal issues
